text: The TV show Lockup is a program on the channel MSNBC that shows life for inmates of county jails and State prisons across the United States of America. The most common facilities shown include the L.A County jail, California's Corcoran state prison, Sedgwick County detention center Kansas, Charleston County jail South Carolina, Different spinoffs of Lockup are Lockup: Raw - A version with commentary from the production crew. Lockup: Extended Stay - Where the crew continues filming at one jail or prison on a long term visit. Lockup: Special Investigation - Profiling specific aspects of the justice system, like juvenile justice. Lockup: World Tour -Visiting prisons abroad and looking into foreign justice systems. Category:American television series
title: Lockup (TV series)
